summary.en: The Notre Dame Life Collection represents historical moments the university's past. Most of the images and artifacts are representative of 19th century moments closely following the founding of the university.

rights: Materials from the Notre Dame Archives may be protected by copyright law under Title 17 U.S. Code.  Cannot be sold, given away, reproduced, or published in whole or in part (including on the internet) without the prior permission of the University of Notre Dame Archives.

en: Invitation to the Exercises of the Golden Jubilee of Notre Dame's founding, 1895/0611.

en: Commemorative Book of Rev Sorin Golden Jubilee

Commemorative Book of Rev. Edward Sorin's Golden Jubilee from Saint St Mary's of the Holy Rosary, Woodland, California, 1888.  Page featuring a drawing by Notre Dame Professor Luigi Gregori of the Virgin Mary and Jesus as a child handing a rosary to Saint Dominic.

en: Cross Near Site of Old Log Chapel
A cross on the site of the first log chapel, with a man sitting on the hill over looking St. Mary's Lake, 1894.
